author: Shelton A
comment: Not visible once installed.  Tried syncing and that didn't work.  No way to access the app. I'm on samsung galaxy with kit kat 4.4 and moto 360 with latest update.

reply.author: Martin Zima
reply.content: Thanks for downloading. I am not sure why, but sometimes, manual syncing does not work the way it should. However, it always eventually showed up on the watch (in half an hour or so), so you might want to try again. MZ

title: Doesn't load

author: Abisheik Singh
comment: The bubble even animates like a real bubble!

author: Clem Wright
title: Worked for me on LG G Watch R!

author: Bill Murphy
comment: Unfortunately, it doesn't work on the LG style watch. Great idea though!
